ext_descriptions.ext_description: A derived_zone_shape_class lists the types of the derived zone shape class.
specifies that type of the derived zone shape class is area.
specifies that type of the derived zone shape class is edge.

A Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship is a product structure relationship that may be represented in a geometric context for the purpose of deriving a 2D or 3D representation of the intersection of a terminal interface.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship is dependent on the the existence of the that specifies the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship as its . There shall be no more than one for a Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies one role of the for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies one role of the for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies the role of the for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.

specifies the role of the for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship. The derived_zone_shape_class specifies either 'area' or 'edge' for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
The combination of interface_plane and mating_zone shall be unique within a population of Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.

ext_description.p:
A Bare_die is a type of
that is used to describe the physical shape and function of a semiconductor device.
ext_description.note:
In the PCA domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be installed into an occurrence of a
to realize a , an occurrence of which is then mounted in the assembly. In this role of performing a function, a Bare_die has terminals.

In the PCB domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be installed into the design of an
to realize an embedded component. In this role, the external surfaces of the Bare_die will be important as they form part of the location information for the occurrence.

A Bare_die implements electrical functionality. It is not necessary to exchange Bare_die information for parts such as molded or ceramic resistors where there is not a separately identifiable and common industry understanding of a die.
In the PCA domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be mounted directly onto the occurrence of a usage view of a PCB.
The existence of oxide or other thin contaminate protection is considered normal for a Bare_die.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:

that specifies the Bare_die as its . The
is simulating a mounting surface.

that specifies the Bare_die as its . There shall be two or more
for a Bare_die.

specifies a role of the
for the Bare_die.

specifies a role of the
for the Bare_die. The maximum_material_condition_centroid_location is the center of mass for a bare die in the state that contains the most material. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Bare_die. The maximum_height_above_seating_plane is the largest extent of the Bare_die above the die_seating_plane. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Bare_die. The least_material_condition_centroid_location is the center of mass for a bare die in the minimum material state. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
The die_seating_plane shall be a .
A Bare_die_bottom_surface is a type of that specifies the bottom surface of a .
A Bare_die_edge_segment_surface is a type of that is included to support the description of specific segments of the edge of a die.

for the Bare_die_edge_segment_surface.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The start_vertex shall not be the end_vertex.
The of Bare_die_edge_segment_surface shall be the same as one of composed_surface.
A Bare_die_edge_surface is a type of that specifies the edge surface of a .
A Bare_die_surface is a type of that specifies the surface area of a . A Bare_die_surface is either a , a , a , or a .

specifies a role of the
for the Bare_die_surface.

A Bare_die_template_terminal is a type of
and a type of
that is on the physical boundary of the
and that collects geometric and material properties for reference by multiple .

ext_description.p:
specifies the role of the
for the Bare_die_template_terminal. The connection_area is the area on the surface of a
to which an electrically conducting material shall be attached to access the electrical functionality of the . There may be more than one
for a Bare_die_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If the data is available in the source system, it shall be supplied.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the role of the
for the Bare_die_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inherited attributes that is set to a fixed value to state that the Bare_die_template_terminal is on the physical boundary of the .

that specifies the Bare_die_template_terminal as its .

ext_description.p: A Bare_die_terminal is a type of and a type of . A Bare_die_terminal is the surface area on a that corresponds to the functional terminal on that .
ext_description.example: A in combination with a are populated to map the functionality of a to the functionality of the for the occurrence of the in the .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies a role of the for the Bare_die_terminal.

ext_description.p: A Bare_die_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship is a type of that identifies the surface on a in which the is located. The terminal is a constituent of the surface area for the .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies a string value equal to 'bare die terminal surface constituent relationship'.

specifies the role of the
for the Bare_die_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship.

specifies the role of the
for the Bare_die_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent upon the other, this attribute shall be the dependent one.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Bare_die_top_surface is a type of that specifies the top surface of a .
A Guided_wave_bare_die_terminal is a type of used with guided waves in high frequency or fiber-optic applications.

A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal is a type of . A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal may be a or additionally may be a . The associated_definition specifies the to which the Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal provides electrical access. A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal does not include location or shape information.
specifies a role of the for the Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal.
